title: Standardized Patient (SP)-Based Practical Competency Enhancement Program in Nursing Simulation

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Simulation-based learning focused on language communication competencies for current nursing professionals

learning_goals: Participants can perform patient-centered nursing skills with over 80% accuracy via standardized patient (SP) simulations.
Participants can improve clinical judgment skills by at least two levels through simulation-based problem-solving processes.
Participants can enhance nursing communication competencies by 75% or more by reflecting on SP feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
